title: Born This Way - Real Stories of Growing Up Gay (2012)epub Gooner
description:
Born This Way - Real Stories of Growing Up Gay (2012).epub Gooner

Publisher: Quirk Books (October 9, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1594745994
ISBN-13: 978-1594745997

Based on the hugely popular blog of the same name, Born This Way shares 100 different memories of growing up LGBTQ. Childhood photographs are accompanied by sweet, funny, and at times heartbreaking personal stories. Collected from around the world and dating from the 1940s to today, these memories speak to the hardships of an unaccepting world and the triumph of pride, self-love, and self-acceptance. This intimate little book is a wonderful gift for all members of the LGBTQ community as well as their friends and families. Like Dan Savageâ€™s It Gets Better Project, Born This Way gives young people everywhere the courage to say, â€œYes, Iâ€™m gay. And I was born this way. Iâ€™ve known it since I was very young, and this is my story"
